column1: 251212,Medical Radiation Therapist,,"Position patients for treatment or examination
column3: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column5: Protect patients or staff members using safety equipment
column7: Work with radiation or radioactive materials
column13: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column21: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column23: Enter patient or treatment data into computers
column25: Adjust settings or positions of medical equipment
column27: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column29: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column33: Interact with patients to build rapport or provide emotional support
column35: Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column37: Calculate numerical data for medical activities
column39: Process x-rays or other medical images
column43: Assist health care practitioners during examinations or treatments
